title: Backpack SFX Bundle + Raw Footage (2024 SALE)
description: Hey Devs :), This Small Backpack Sound Bundle was made with care and love for games
longDescription:
Ch4osSFX Presents All You Need Backpack Sound Bundle


Embark on a rich auditory experience with my thoughtfully curated sound bundle, encompassing over 100 high-quality, 16-bit | 44.100-48.000Hz WAV meticulously edited SFX. Each sound file has been carefully refined for optimal quality. The bundle includes original raw recorded sound footage, providing a versatile foundation for customization. Additionally, enjoy a bonus raw sound file featuring metal/barbed wire sounds, adding a touch of versatility to this comprehensive collection.

Tailored for developers seeking distinct audio profiles for their games, this pack serves as a practical toolkit. It covers a range of backpack interactions, from Old Backpacks to Rubber, Plastic, and zipper Backpacks. The collection spans various scenarios, including searching, item handling, equipping and de-equipping, zipper sounds, and more—each sound file meticulously edited to meet professional standards.


Designed to be a flexible resource, the pack accommodates different preferences. Whether you prefer using the sounds as is or wish to delve into the intricacies of editing, the choice is yours. Immerse yourself in a world of auditory possibilities, complemented by the raw and bonus elements, and elevate your game's audio experience with this reliable and versatile sound bundle.


2024 Special! 🎁 Elevate your game with our sound bundle at a special price for the Hole Year! Enjoy 100+ edited SFX, raw footage, and a bonus file. Tailored for developers. Update's coming out Soon, 2024 with some extra love better mastering for quallity "ready to game" audio and 10+ more sounds and one more backpack type coming soon.. 🚀🔊


Sample DEMO: https://on.soundcloud.com/f9Nqd
